message.content:
Note that the code snippets provided assume a Linux or Unix-like environment. The libraries used are available for Python and can be installed using pip or other package managers. The functionality provided in the code may not be possible or may require adjustments depending on the actual operating system and network environment.

Additionally, the provided code snippets are meant to gather network information and do not cover all aspects of comprehensive testing. The testing plan should include additional steps to cover different test scenarios, input validations, error handling, performance testing, and other relevant aspects of the program. You may consider using testing frameworks such as pytest or unittest to structure and automate your test cases.

Please ensure to adapt and expand the testing plan to cater to the specific requirements and characteristics of the program being tested.
